thread.title: Michael Gray
thread.title_full: Israel Institute of Biblical Studies (formerly eTeacherBiblical.com) reviewed by Michael Gray

author: Michael Gray
title: Michael Gray
text: I am enjoying this course very much. Francois is a great teacher and his own enthusiasm for the Hebrew language and for the bible is very evident and infectious.
